ygData.subject: Re: Wizzards and the assertion that we can solo. (long, sorry)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I beg to differ. I m not 12, I m 11th, and I can solo and take: Orc Centurions, Lions, Lioness (East Commonlands) Sand Scarabs (North Ro) I have a single
ygData.messageBody:
According to dayne@...:
> Dayne IS NOT capable of soloing most blues, nor some greens. It IS
> that simple. Root holds about 50% of the time. BLUES resist about 25%
> of my spells.

I beg to differ. I'm not 12, I'm 11th, and I can solo and take:
Orc Centurions, Lions, Lioness (East Commonlands)
Sand Scarabs (North Ro)

I have a single piece of woven, and no other fancy equipment. I rely on my
trusty worn great staff. All these were taken with moderate ease
(meaning I usually end up at 50% mana and 40% life), but I never engage
unless I'm full on both ranges.

It is true my spells get a partial resistance, and I usually have to cast
three of four times before one goes uninterrupted, but this almost always
work. I can't solo Kodiaks - about same level - however. These guys seem
to do damage more consistently, and I have to escape. The only centurions
that I won't touch are those with slashing weapons - if a centurion has
a two-handed sword, I'm almost dead.

--
